Name: Operation Transient
Details: Operation Transient was an SLDF Communication Command Communication in 2572 to improve speed of communication to the Rim Worlds. The devices were able to pass small amounts of data to other Black Boxes within a hundred light years. In 2630 the SLDF Communications Command ordered all the Black Boxes collected and dismantled, but by then all worlds of the Star League had received these Black Boxes. Who knows how many?
